ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet

ygData.messageBody:
never said I was perfect, just informed. Albeit a little misinformed.

--- Ken Morris <kmorris2@...> wrote:
> From: "Ken Morris" <kmorris2@...>
>
> Sorry Ziffnab, yas need to read that EQ site just a
> little better ;) It
> doesn't say IS implemented, it says WILL be
> implemented. Specialization is
> not currently working in the game, but should be
> added shortly, we all hope
> ;)
>
> Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 10:53 AM
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Ice Comet
>
>
> > From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
> >
> > Goto the official EQ website and read in the
> Developer section. You
> > will notice that SPECIALIZATION has been
> implemented now for our use.
> > Yes, it was not working before, but is working now
> and explains how it
> > works.
> >
> > - Ziffnab, Dispellor of Rumors
>
>
>
